com.jde.model.entity.bullet

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.model.entity.Entity
      • com.jde.model.entity.bullet.Bullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Spawnable

    public class Bullet
extends Entity
implements Spawnable
    This Bullet class represents a entity that can spawn and hit the player
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)
